name: Tengoku 2.5: 恋愛弾 〜 Capture the Heart
name_original: Tengoku 2.5: 恋愛弾 〜 Capture the Heart
description:
This game is still in development, but should be playable to the end. If you encounter breaking bugs on web, try the download version.

Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

Check out the other Tengoku Project games here! https://itch.io/c/1985316/tengoku-project

Tengoku Renaidan (Love Bullet)

One morning, Angelica receives a surprising present in the mail - a camera! Feeling both excited and intrigued by who could have sent it to her, she sets out to revisit various places and take photos with the people there... Only, this time everyone's emotions are changed. 

It's not like they... like you, is it? 

Controls Move Arrow keys Charge camera/ Slow movementShiftTake photoZMove cameraHold Arrow keys + ZPause SpaceToggle fullscreen Alt + Enter Hints
  • You are invulnerable for a very short period after taking a photo, so use this time wisely...
  • For more points, take more risks!
  • Taking photos clears enemy bullets
  • There are multiple routes to play through, so try to find out who bought the camera!
